title: How to Relax on a Raft

steps.headline: Plan everything you will need in advance.
steps.description: Make a list and check everything off when you have it. Knowing that you have everything that you need will make you happier.

steps.headline: Clothes.
steps.description: Pack comfortable clothes that you know will be suitable for the raft and conditions on the water. Dress of the weather too. For example, if it is going to be cold, dress warmly and if it's going to be warm, take suncream and a hat. A rug would be a good idea too as you can lie on it if the raft isn't comfortable.

steps.headline: When you get to the raft check out the safest and most comfortable places on it.
Work out where safety devices are should you need them.
Get used to walking about on the raft and try to gain confidence.
Remind yourself that everything has been taken care of and that you know where everything is when you need it and put your feet up and relax.
